thread.title: Philandis Wimbush
thread.title_full: American Freight Furniture & Mattress reviewed by Philandis Wimbush

author: Philandis Wimbush
title: Philandis Wimbush
text: The staff is excellent at picking up on what your likes and dislikes are. They are friendly, courteous and knowledgeable about the products. They were helpful with delivery dates and times and they are always cheerful and smiling when I go there.
